name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>時<rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby>空<rt>くう</rt></ruby><ruby>戦<rt>せん</rt></ruby><ruby>闘<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby>ロードブリティッシュ

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this card's name becomes "Gradius". Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Gradius' Option" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you can only attack with Machine Type monsters that have 800 original DEF.
